page.name: Invitation to Check in with Other Educators
page.content:
Where appropriate, consider doing one or more of the following:

1) Take this course with a peer and talk about what you are discovering as you move through it together.

2) Discuss questions with a colleague in your program (beginning teacher, seasoned educator, program coordinator, etc.)

3) Partner with a colleague in an Induction Program: The Teacher Effectiveness in Adult Education landing page and, in particular, The Mentoring Guide for Teacher Induction provides detailed support for beginning teachers and mentors moving through this course. 

4) Select question(s) to discuss at a staff meeting to find out about related instructional practices teachers in your program engage in. 

5) Reach out to other educators across the country through the course thread in the Evidence-based Professional Development Community of Practice (CoP).

  • Discover what past course participants have said.
  • Connect with current CoP members.
